name: Socializer
description: Veggies sunt bona vobis, proinde vos postulo esse magis grape pea sprouts horseradish courgette maize spinach prairie turnip jícama coriander quandong gourd broccoli seakale gumbo. Parsley corn lentil zucchini radicchio maize burdock avocado sea lettuce. Garbanzo tigernut earthnut pea fennel.
creator: PerryKinder
requirements: I think you're all insane, but I guess I am too.  Anybody would be if they were stuck on earth with you.

name: RueFire
description:
# Rue Fire 
 The path of the righteous man is beset on all sides by the iniquities of the selfish and the tyranny of evil men. Blessed is he who, in the name of charity and good will, shepherds the weak through the valley of darkness, for he is truly his brother's keeper and the finder of lost children. 

And I will strike down upon thee with great vengeance and furious anger those who would attempt to poison and destroy My brothers. And you will know My name is the Lord when I lay My vengeance upon thee.
creator: GarnetDarling
requirements: You think water moves fast? You should see ice. It moves like it has a mind.

name: ScholarFlair
description:
# Dear Jamie, 
You, dear camellia, expectantly await the light of my moon, yet my light is more of a scorching, wilting, dry desert heat, and as your metaphorical surgeon, it is with a heavy heart that I urge you to seek a second opinion. I return your heart to you... Yours, but not really, 
### Garnet.
creator: ConnieRolek
requirements: I'm going to bed before either of you come up with another clever idea to get us both killed.  Or worse. . . expelled!
